TopicTitle: X-22 Phantom I and Phantom II

Articles.Content:
I have made two almost stock, military aircraft. they are the phantom series, with the phantom I, phantom I modified, and phantom II. the mods are tweakscale and bdarmory. tweakscale was so I didn't need multipart wings.

X-22 "Phantom I" scout

a bit unstable, and not exactly enough lift

Javascript is disabled. View full album

X-22 "Phantom II" fighter

armmed with 2 air to air missiles
